alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dane; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 2:21AM CDT until July 24 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Columbia County in south central Wisconsin... Northwestern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Eastern Sauk County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 221 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Baraboo, or near Baraboo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waunakee, Baraboo, Portage, Windsor, Prairie Du Sac, Sauk City, Wisconsin Dells, Lake Wisconsin, Deforest, Lodi, Lake Delton, Poynette, Mazomanie, West Baraboo, Dane, Arlington, Bluffview, North Freedom, Merrimac and Rock Springs. This includes the following Locations Mirror Lake State Park, Gibraltar Rock Natural Area County Park, Pine Island State Wildlife Area, Kilbourn Dam, Historic Indian Agency House, French Creek Wildlife Area, and Alliant Energy Portage Power Plant. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
